1. 打成jar包并安装到maven本地仓库

   1. 安装maven-publish插件

      ```groovy
      plugins {
          id 'maven-publish'
      }
      ```

   2. gradle-> tasks-> publishing-> publishToMavenLocal

      ![avatar](data:image/png;base64,)

2. gradle使用maven本地仓库的包

   1. maven库添加本地仓库

      ```groovy
      repositories {
          mavenLocal()
      }
      ```
